sections.heading: Implementing rules. The Department of Commerce and Economic Opportunity shall have the authority to adopt rules to implement this Act.
sections.text: Implementing rules. The Department of Commerce and Economic Opportunity shall have the authority to adopt rules to implement this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
